title: Dj Sona /Unavailable
body:
**Hello everyone ,

I just have little question real quick , at this moment the update is over , I guess , but DJ Sona still unavailable , when will we be able to buy her ?

thx for answering me and sorry for my broken English , at least i'm sure you understand . 

Friendly Alice**

replies.body: Right? I want to buy Final Boss Veigar, but I don't want to do that just so DJ Sona comes out a few hours or days late and me be unable to buy her for  a couple of more days.
seriously, whats up with this . w .
Same, I thought she would be available upon patch?
Pleease answer Riot, I've waited such a long time for this! It pains me it's not out yet : /
